pages.text: Salt can be found in Salt Oasis found in the Desert and can be used for many things, such as $(l:hexalia:tools/purifying_salts)Purifying Salts$().$(br2)You can place it on the ground by right-clicking, this is used for rituals.
You can combine Salt with Rotten Flesh to obtain Leather.
Salt can be mined from Salt Blocks in order to obtain Salt, a Fortune pickaxe allows you to mine it more efficiently.
Saltsprout is a new plant that can be planted in $(l:hexalia:blocks/infused_dirt)Infused Farmland$() and can be crushed into Salt.
A lamp can be crafted with Copper Ingot and Torch to illuminate dark areas.
